sources.title: Flash Gordon Conquers The Universe (1940) 12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
Exclusive PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 12-Chapter Cliffhanger!
Stars: Buster Crabbe, Carol Hughes, Frank Shannon, Charles Middleton
Directors: Ford Beebe, Ray Taylor

The final installment of the Flash Gordon Trilogy! Once again, Earth is in deadly peril thanks to Ming the Merciless. This time from a mysterious and lethal plague known as the Purple Death. Will Flash save the day just in the nick of time? Find out and watch this PizzaFLIX Cliffhanger Serial Marathon.

2:48:19  CHAPTER 10: The Death Mist
3:06:31  CHAPTER 11: Stark Treachery
3:26:31  CHAPTER 12: Doom of the Dictator
3:45:52 Please Subscribe!

sources.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe (1940) Sci-Fi, Adventure | 12 Chapters | TV Serial Marathon
sources.description:
ZOOMING OFF THE EARTH! Sky-Rocketing Through Space... Braving New Perils Of The Stratosphere!
Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.

Directors: Ford Beebe, Ray Taylor
Writers: Alex Raymond, Basil Dickey, George H. Plympton
Stars: Buster Crabbe, Carol Hughes, Charles Middleton, Shirley Deane
Genres: Action, Adventure, Family, Sci-Fi


00:00 Full film of all 12 episodes.
01:22 Chapter 1 - The Purple Death!
20:28 Chapter 2 - Freezing Torture!
41:24 Chapter 3 - Walking Bombs!
01:02:25 Chapter 4 - The Destroying Ray!
01:19:32 Chapter 5 - The Palace of Terror
01:39:03 Chapter 6 - Flaming Death
01:59:36 Chapter 7 - The Land of the Dead!
02:19:09 Chapter 8 - The Fiery Abyss!
02:36:54 Chapter 9 - The Pool of Peril!
02:54:18 Chapter 10 - The Death Mist!
03:13:28 Chapter 11 - Stark Treachery!
03:34:15 Chapter 12 - Doom of the Dictator!


@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdYDDUshEcMs1CHZW1booguo

metadata.Plot: A mysterious plague, the Purple Death, ravages the earth. Dr. Zarkov, investigating in his spaceship, finds a ship from planet Mongo seeding the atmosphere with dust. Sure enough, Ming the Merciless is up to his old tricks. So it's back to Mongo for Flash, Dale, and Zarkov, this time with ready-made allies waiting: Prince Barin of Arboria and Queen Fria of the frozen northern land of Frigia; where, it so happens, is found polarite, antidote to the plague. But Ming will use all his forces to keep our heroes from thwarting his plans of conquest...
metadata.Writer: Alex Raymond, Basil Dickey, George H. Plympton
metadata.Actors: Buster Crabbe, Carol Hughes, Charles Middleton
